sentences: Brian Reitzell (born December 24, 1965 in California) is an American musician, composer, record producer and music supervisor best known for his work on many film and TV soundtracks.
Reitzell also toured with the band on their "Moon Safari" tour in 1998 and again in 2000 and 2001.
In 2003 he was nominated for a BAFTA, along with Kevin Shields of My Bloody Valentine, for the score to Sofia Coppola's film Lost in Translation.
In 2012 Reitzell scored Turner Prize winning UK artist Elizabeth Price's video installation, "West Hinder".
